entries.title: Patton Oswalt on the Origin of His Name and the Benefits of Being Funny
entries.description: The actor-comedian and ‘The 1% Club’ host on his comedy clique, bombing his first stand-up and how ‘The King of Queens’ changed his career.

entries.title: Should a Retired Couple Get a Dog? He Says Yes. She Says No.
entries.description: There’s nothing like the emotional support you get from a dog. But will it pin us down too much?

entries.title: Best Buy Catches AI Fever
entries.description: Tech upgrades are coming, but the hype in the retailer’s stock might be overdone.

entries.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Consolidate After Jump
entries.description: U.S. natural gas futures dipped after Monday’s big gains, with this week’s hot weather seen driving power-sector demand.

entries.title: Merrick Garland, Three Special Counsels and a Justice Department Under Fire
entries.description: The attorney general has tried to stay above the political fray while overseeing investigations into Trump, Biden and his son.

entries.title: Biden's Cease-Fire Plan Seeks to Push Hamas and Israel Into a Deal Neither Wants
entries.description: The U.S. president is more interested in a deal than the two warring parties.

entries.title: Euro Falls as Dollar Recovers
entries.description: The euro weakened against the dollar as the U.S. currency recovered from Monday’s slump prompted by weak ISM manufacturing data.

entries.title: Cannabis Producer Seeks Boston Beer Merger
entries.description: In a letter, the Green Thumb CEO outlined the potential benefits of a combination, including allowing the cannabis producer to be listed on a major U.S. exchange.

entries.title: George Soros's Son Has Found a New Cause to Back: Pro Softball
entries.description: Athletes Unlimited, the sports enterprise co-founded by Jonathan Soros and Jon Patricof, is launching the new venture, adding to its existing women’s leagues in volleyball, lacrosse and basketball.

entries.title: S&P 500 Slips as GameStop Shares Swing
entries.description: U.S. stocks slipped while election jitters rattled markets overseas.

entries.title: The Morning Risk Report
entries.description: China is ‘prepositioning’ for future cyberattacks, says the new NSA chief, and an appeals court blocks a venture firm’s grant program for Black women. Also, New York is set to restrict social-media algorithms for teens.

entries.title: All Hail Phoenix: America's King of the Robo-Taxi
entries.description: The Phoenix area reigns as the world leader in autonomous-vehicle service, providing tens of thousands of rides a week, including the mayor’s date nights.

entries.title: Who is Keith Gill? The Meme Lord Is Back
entries.description: The amateur investor who turned GameStop into a phenomenon has revealed a monster stake in the company worth $260 million.

entries.title: India's Modi Struggles to Hold On to Majority, Early Election Results Show
entries.description: The Indian prime minister and his Hindu nationalist party appeared to be set for a severe setback amid a strong fight from a revived opposition.

entries.title: German Unemployment Holds Steady
entries.description: Germany’s jobless rate was stable at 5.9% in May, reflecting a resilient jobs market, although the number of unemployed ticked up ahead of forecasts.

entries.title: How $148 Aritzia Pants Took Over the Young Working Woman's Closet
entries.description: Aritzia’s Effortless Pant is, on the surface, a normal pair of pleated trousers. And yet, devotees are inspired to rave about it on TikTok and buy in multiples.

entries.title: Forget Crowded Airport Lines. Worry About Thunderstorms and Derechos This Summer.
entries.description: A warmer climate is making a type of wind storm called a derecho and other disruptive weather more common.

entries.title: Economists Lean Toward Bank of Canada Interest Rate Cut on Wednesday
entries.description: Canada’s central bank could be the first among G-7 authorities to begin policy easing after aggressive rate increases to curb inflation.

entries.title: Influencers Are Driving a New Category of Unionizing: Pharmacists
entries.description: Pharmacists have taken to social media, under handles like “The Accidental Pharmacist” and “RxComedy,” to spark unionization drives in the stores.

entries.title: Health Care Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: The latest Market Talks covering the Health Care sector.
